column2: ENGLISH
Though I am her master, I can feel my heart flutter whenever I see [From.GetFirstName]. Does my heart belong to her?
Yes, it does
She's nothing but my bed warmer.
I was stunned when my concubine asked if I might ever consider marrying her.
As a matter of fact...
Your place is not at my side.
Being with my beloved concubine is such bliss, I wish that everyone could share it.
It's such a stress relief.
It makes me feel so healthy.
It makes me feel so virile.
It makes me feel so feminine.
It is one thing that I have to share [Spouse.GetFirstName] at all, but he has no right to hold that woman higher in worth than his own wife!
Demand he put her away.
[Spouse.GetFirstName] decides whether to put his beloved concubine away.
I'll just have to get my hands dirty...
[Root.GetFirstName] plots to kill the beloved concubine.
I hope he gets over her...
My wife approached me today, asking if I might set aside my lover. She told me she would be... appreciative.
Yes, yes, of course I shall, dear.
My wife is quite pleased.
I'll never give up the woman I love.
My wife is quite cross with me
My beloved [From.GetFirstName], dead at the hands of my jealous wife. My blood boils with thoughts of vengeance...
You'll never see the light of day again!
Her killer will share her fate!
But there is nothing I can do...
My lover narrowly escaped death at the hands of my treacherous spouse!
She won't be plotting from within a jail cell.
Let me show you how you kill someone...
Now, now, don't you try that again.
Wife is pleased to get away with it.
Dreadful! Absolutely dreadful!
My wife is complaining that I prefer a concubine over her.
No, no, not true at all.
Let me make amends
My wife becomes more dear to me.
My deepest apologies, goblin.
Though it had long escaped my notice, there is an inner beauty in my wife that captivates me.
Am I falling in love?
[From.GetFirstName] has escaped!
Drat!
My concubine made an escape attempt, but failed.
I cannot abide my cruelty any longer, you may go.
Well, how fortunate!
The axe will give her the release she desires.
My husband's heir is the child of a concubine. Should I act to ensure my own son's inheritance?
It is unseemly that a trueborn son goes without.
Husband is asked to give land to son.
My son will surely have some inheritance...
My wife is asking that I give some land to our son.
It is only fair.
Be patient, boy!
I had to give chase in order to whip my husband's useless concubine, [From.GetFirstName].
What are you smiling about, rat?
My wife has gone missing, and I fear the worst. No one seems to know what happened to her.
But I have my suspicions...
My concubine, [From.GetFirstName], was caught plotting my wife's murder!
Off to the dungeons with you.
That will cost you your head...
Well, I can't say she didn't deserve to die.
How awful!
I got to watch with satisfaction as my husband had his 'beloved' concubine sent away from court.
Now, as for his reward...
My husband dismissed my request to exile his concubine without hesitation.
I certainly hope you're happy with her, cad!
All I had wanted was for my husband to pay more attention to me. He only looked at me long enough to insult me...
You callous bastard!
With my husband gone, I am no longer so angry.
Good riddance!
With my husband gone, we can no longer have our fun.
A pity, really.
I have killed that pesky concubine. I only hope that I can get away with it.
Now I must wait.
Not only did I fail to kill that bothersome concubine, the entire court knows what I attempted!
I am at my husband's mercy...
Even though I was caught red-handed, my husband has done nothing to punish me!
What fortune!
My husband refused to give our son any land...
That miser!
One of the courtiers, noticing the strain of my marriage, has offered his comfort...
Let's see how much my husband likes sharing.
Licentiousness won't fix anything.
Scorned Wife
Hell hath no fury...
Appreciative Wife
There are benefits to a happy wife...
